00054 inline void
00055     compute3DCentroid (PointCloud3D *cloud, const std::vector<int> &indices,
00056                        Eigen::Vector4d &centroid)
00057   {
00058 
00059         //std::vector<Point3D> *points = cloud->getPointCloud();
00060     // Initialize to 0
00061     centroid.setZero ();
00062     if (indices.size () == 0) 
00063       return;
00064     // For each point in the cloud
00065     int cp = 0;
00066     for (size_t i = 0; i < indices.size (); ++i)
00067     {
00068       // Check if the point is invalid
00069       if ( isnan( (*cloud->getPointCloud())[indices[i]].getX() ) || isnan( (*cloud->getPointCloud())[indices[i]].getY() ) || isnan( (*cloud->getPointCloud())[indices[i]].getZ() ))
00070         continue;
00071 
00072       centroid[0] += (*cloud->getPointCloud())[indices[i]].getX();
00073       centroid[1] += (*cloud->getPointCloud())[indices[i]].getY();
00074       centroid[2] += (*cloud->getPointCloud())[indices[i]].getZ();
00075       cp++;
00076     }
00077     centroid /= cp;
00078   }
00079 
00084  inline void
00085     compute3DCentroid (PointCloud3D* cloud, Eigen::Vector4d &centroid)
00086   {
00087           //std::vector<Point3D> *points = cloud->getPointCloud();
00088           // Initialize to 0
00089     centroid.setZero ();
00090     if (cloud->getSize() == 0)
00091       return;
00092     // For each point in the cloud
00093     int cp = 0;
00094     for (size_t i = 0; i < cloud->getSize (); ++i)
00095     {
00096       // Check if the point is invalid
00097         if ( isnan( (*cloud->getPointCloud())[i].getX() ) || isnan( (*cloud->getPointCloud())[i].getY() ) || isnan( (*cloud->getPointCloud())[i].getZ() ))
00098           continue;
00099 
00100         centroid[0] += (*cloud->getPointCloud())[i].getX();
00101         centroid[1] += (*cloud->getPointCloud())[i].getY();
00102         centroid[2] += (*cloud->getPointCloud())[i].getZ();
00103         cp++;
00104     }
00105     centroid /= cp;
00106   }
00107 
00114 inline void
00115     computeCovarianceMatrix (PointCloud3D* cloud,
00116                              const Eigen::Vector4d &centroid, Eigen::Matrix3d &covariance_matrix)
00117   {
00118           //std::vector<Point3D> *points = cloud->getPointCloud();
00119           // Initialize to 0
00120     covariance_matrix.setZero ();
00121 
00122     if (cloud->getSize() == 0)
00123       return;
00124     // For each point in the cloud
00125     for (size_t i = 0; i < cloud->getSize(); ++i)
00126     {
00127       // Check if the point is invalid
00128         if ( isnan( (*cloud->getPointCloud())[i].getX() ) || isnan( (*cloud->getPointCloud())[i].getY() ) || isnan( (*cloud->getPointCloud())[i].getZ() ))
00129           continue;
00130 
00131       Point3D p;
00132       p.setX( (*cloud->getPointCloud())[i].getX() - centroid[0]);
00133       p.setY( (*cloud->getPointCloud())[i].getY() - centroid[1]);
00134       p.setZ( (*cloud->getPointCloud())[i].getZ() - centroid[2]);
00135 
00136       double demean_xy = p.getX() * p.getY();
00137       double demean_xz = p.getX() * p.getZ();
00138       double demean_yz = p.getY() * p.getZ();
00139 
00140       covariance_matrix (0, 0) += p.getX() * p.getX();
00141       covariance_matrix (0, 1) += demean_xy;
00142       covariance_matrix (0, 2) += demean_xz;
00143       covariance_matrix (1, 0) += demean_xy;
00144       covariance_matrix (1, 1) += p.getY() * p.getY();
00145       covariance_matrix (1, 2) += demean_yz;
00146       covariance_matrix (2, 0) += demean_xz;
00147       covariance_matrix (2, 1) += demean_yz;
00148       covariance_matrix (2, 2) += p.getZ() * p.getZ();
00149     }
00150   }
00151 
00153 
00160 inline void
00161     computeCovarianceMatrix (PointCloud3D* cloud, const std::vector<int> &indices,
00162                              const Eigen::Vector4d &centroid, Eigen::Matrix3d &covariance_matrix)
00163   {
00164         //  std::vector<Point3D> *points = cloud->getPointCloud();
00165     // Initialize to 0
00166     covariance_matrix.setZero ();
00167 
00168     if (indices.size () == 0) 
00169       return;
00170     // For each point in the cloud
00171     for (size_t i = 0; i < indices.size (); ++i)
00172     {
00173       // Check if the point is invalid
00174         if ( isnan( (*cloud->getPointCloud())[indices[i]].getX() ) || isnan( (*cloud->getPointCloud())[indices[i]].getY() ) || isnan( (*cloud->getPointCloud())[indices[i]].getZ() ))
00175           continue;
00176 
00177       Point3D p;
00178       p.setX( (*cloud->getPointCloud())[indices[i]].getX() - centroid[0]);
00179       p.setY( (*cloud->getPointCloud())[indices[i]].getY() - centroid[1]);
00180       p.setZ( (*cloud->getPointCloud())[indices[i]].getZ() - centroid[2]);
00181 
00182       double demean_xy = p.getX() * p.getY();
00183       double demean_xz = p.getX() * p.getZ();
00184       double demean_yz = p.getY() * p.getZ();
00185 
00186       covariance_matrix (0, 0) += p.getX() * p.getX();
00187       covariance_matrix (0, 1) += demean_xy;
00188       covariance_matrix (0, 2) += demean_xz;
00189       covariance_matrix (1, 0) += demean_xy;
00190       covariance_matrix (1, 1) += p.getY() * p.getY();
00191       covariance_matrix (1, 2) += demean_yz;
00192       covariance_matrix (2, 0) += demean_xz;
00193       covariance_matrix (2, 1) += demean_yz;
00194       covariance_matrix (2, 2) += p.getZ() * p.getZ();
00195     }
00196   }
00197 
00208 inline void
00209   solvePlaneParameters (const Eigen::Matrix3d &covariance_matrix, const Eigen::Vector4d &point,
00210                         Eigen::Vector4d &plane_parameters, double &curvature)
00211 {
00212   // Avoid getting hung on Eigen's optimizers
00213   for (int i = 0; i < 3; ++i)
00214     for (int j = 0; j < 3; ++j)
00215       if (!std::isfinite (covariance_matrix (i, j)))
00216       {
00217         //ROS_WARN ("[pcl::solvePlaneParameteres] Covariance matrix has NaN/Inf values!");
00218         plane_parameters.setConstant (std::numeric_limits<double>::quiet_NaN ());
00219         curvature = std::numeric_limits<double>::quiet_NaN ();
00220         return;
00221       }
00222 
00223   // Extract the eigenvalues and eigenvectors
00224 
00225   Eigen::SelfAdjointEigenSolver<Eigen::Matrix3d> ei_symm (covariance_matrix);
00226   EIGEN_ALIGN_MEMORY Eigen::Vector3d eigen_values  = ei_symm.eigenvalues ();
00227   EIGEN_ALIGN_MEMORY Eigen::Matrix3d eigen_vectors = ei_symm.eigenvectors ();
00228 
00229   // Normalize the surface normal (eigenvector corresponding to the smallest eigenvalue)
00230   // Note: Remember to take care of the eigen_vectors ordering
00231   double norm = 1.0 / eigen_vectors.col (0).norm ();
00232 
00233   plane_parameters[0] = eigen_vectors (0, 0) * norm;
00234   plane_parameters[1] = eigen_vectors (1, 0) * norm;
00235   plane_parameters[2] = eigen_vectors (2, 0) * norm;
00236 
00237   // Hessian form (D = nc . p_plane (centroid here) + p)
00238   plane_parameters[3] = -1 * (plane_parameters[0] * point[0] +
00239                               plane_parameters[1] * point[1] +
00240                               plane_parameters[2] * point[2]);
00241 
00242   // Compute the curvature surface change
00243   double eig_sum = eigen_values.sum ();
00244   if (eig_sum != 0)
00245     curvature = fabs ( eigen_values[0] / eig_sum );
00246   else
00247     curvature = 0;
00248 }
00249 
00251 
00262 inline void
00263   solvePlaneParameters (const Eigen::Matrix3d &covariance_matrix,
00264                         double &nx, double &ny, double &nz, double &curvature)
00265 {
00266   // Avoid getting hung on Eigen's optimizers
00267   for (int i = 0; i < 3; ++i)
00268     for (int j = 0; j < 3; ++j)
00269       if (!std::isfinite (covariance_matrix (i, j)))
00270       {
00271         //ROS_WARN ("[pcl::solvePlaneParameteres] Covariance matrix has NaN/Inf values!");
00272         nx = ny = nz = curvature = std::numeric_limits<double>::quiet_NaN ();
00273         return;
00274       }
00275   // Extract the eigenvalues and eigenvectors
00276   Eigen::SelfAdjointEigenSolver<Eigen::Matrix3d> ei_symm (covariance_matrix);
00277   EIGEN_ALIGN_MEMORY Eigen::Vector3d eigen_values  = ei_symm.eigenvalues ();
00278   EIGEN_ALIGN_MEMORY Eigen::Matrix3d eigen_vectors = ei_symm.eigenvectors ();
00279 
00280   // Normalize the surface normal (eigenvector corresponding to the smallest eigenvalue)
00281   // Note: Remember to take care of the eigen_vectors ordering
00282   double norm = 1.0 / eigen_vectors.col (0).norm ();
00283 
00284   nx = eigen_vectors (0, 0) * norm;
00285   ny = eigen_vectors (1, 0) * norm;
00286   nz = eigen_vectors (2, 0) * norm;
00287 
00288   // Compute the curvature surface change
00289   double eig_sum = eigen_values.sum ();
00290   if (eig_sum != 0)
00291     curvature = fabs ( eigen_values[0] / eig_sum );
00292   else
00293     curvature = 0;
00294 }
